item.title: UI/UX Designer for Education Dashboards - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented UI/UX designer to support us in improving the existing education dashboards. The primary focus of this project is to increase the visual appeal and enhance the user's ability to extract insights from the data. Our goal is to create a seamless and intuitive user experience that draws users deeper into the data. As a UI/UX designer, you will collaborate with our development team to implement design improvements and create engaging user interfaces. This role requires a strong understanding of user-centered design principles and proficiency in tools such as Power BI or Balsamiq.

Skills required:
- UI/UX design
- User-centered design principles
- Power BI and wireframing tools
- Data visualization

Join us in this exciting opportunity to shape the future of education dashboards.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00

Category: UX/UI Design
Skills:Web Design, User Interface Design, Wireframing, Mockup, Responsive Design

item.title: Teach me how to use Copy Data Pipeline Incremental Load in Azure Synapse from OData or other sources - Upwork
item.description:
Hi friends,
I'm looking for an expert that really worked with Data Engineering projects, currently the task is:
I've a simple table (OData or Dataverse) that contains few columns, but it does not have an index column or Modified Timestamp.

I need to learn how to use Synapse Copy Data tool, to copy this data to Azure SQL DB or Azure Data Lake St. Gen2, on schedule to get the new data every xxx hours/days

I know the idea to use a staging table and use Lookup to compare the data in the destination and staging then insert only the data not in the destination.

Please apply only for the job if you really did similar jobs, this is a learning project as I'm trying to join the data engineering world, the work can be done in my machine thru Zoom meeting or you can do it and guide me to follow.

The task can take less than 1 hour

item.description:
We are looking for a skilled professional who can help us integrate a SharePoint site with a model-driven Power App. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of both SharePoint and Power Apps, as well as experience in integrating the two platforms. The main objective of this project is to establish seamless communication and data exchange between the SharePoint site and the Power App.

    Responsibilities:
    - Analyze the requirements and design an integration solution
    - Develop and implement the integration using SharePoint and Power Apps
    - Test and troubleshoot any issues that arise during the integration process
    - Collaborate with the team to ensure a successful integration

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in SharePoint development and administration
    - Experience with model-driven Power Apps
    - Strong knowledge of REST APIs and data integration techniques
    - Ability to troubleshoot and resolve integration issues

    This is a medium-sized project that is expected to last between 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate level expert who can deliver high-quality results within the given timeframe.

item.title: ETL engineer needed to integrate data into PowerBI dashboard. PowerBI certification required. - Upwork
item.description:
Project Objectives:
a. Implement Power BI as a data visualization and analytics platform.
b. Develop an ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) functionality to pre-process data from various sources.
c. Integrate data from multiple backend systems, including Finance (Netsuite), Healthcare (SQL), HR (SQL), and Core System (SQL).
d. Enable the ability to import data from Excel files.
Power BI Implementation:
a. Install and configure Power BI Desktop and Power BI Service.
b. Design and develop interactive dashboards and visualizations based on business requirements.
c. Implement data security measures and user access controls.
d. Provide training to end-users on using Power BI for data exploration and analysis.
ETL Development:
a. Analyze source systems and data structures to identify extraction requirements.
b. Design and develop ETL processes using a suitable ETL tool (e.g., Power Query, Azure Data Factory, or custom-built solution).
c. Implement data extraction from the following systems:
Finance System (Netsuite)
Healthcare System (SQL)
HR System (SQL)
Core System (SQL)
d. Develop data transformation logic to cleanse, standardize, and validate data.
e. Load transformed data into a target data repository (e.g., data warehouse or Power BI's data model).
Data Integration:
a. Establish connectivity between the ETL process and the source systems.
b. Develop data mappings and integration workflows to ensure accurate data transfer.
c. Implement scheduled data refreshes to keep the data up to date.
d. Enable the ability to import data from Excel files and integrate it with the existing data sources.
Data Modeling and Optimization:
a. Design a data model that supports efficient querying and analysis in Power BI.
b. Optimize data structures and aggregations for improved performance.
c. Create calculated fields, dimensions, and measures to support reporting requirements.
Testing and Quality Assurance:
a. Develop and execute comprehensive test cases to validate data accuracy and integrity.
b. Perform user acceptance testing (UAT) to ensure the solution meets business requirements.
c. Implement data quality checks and error handling mechanisms.
Documentation and Knowledge Transfer:
a. Prepare detailed technical documentation, including data dictionaries, ETL process flows, and system architecture diagrams.
b. Develop user manuals and training materials for end-users.
c. Conduct knowledge transfer sessions with the client's technical team.
Project Management:
a. Develop a project plan with milestones, deliverables, and timelines.
b. Conduct regular status meetings and provide progress reports to stakeholders.
c. Manage project risks, issues, and dependencies.
d. Ensure timely delivery of the solution within the agreed-upon scope and budget.
Post-Implementation Support:
a. Provide post-implementation support for a defined period to address any issues or questions.
b. Assist with performance tuning and optimization as needed.
c. Provide guidance on future enhancements and scalability considerations.
Deliverables:
Power BI dashboards and visualizations.
ETL processes for data extraction, transformation, and loading.
Data integration workflows and connectivity.
Optimized data model for Power BI.
Test cases and quality assurance reports.
Technical documentation and user manuals.
Knowledge transfer sessions and training materials.
Project plan and status reports.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$100.00
Posted On: May 30, 2024 03:59 UTC
Category: Data Engineering
Skills:Database Design, Database Architecture, Data Preprocessing, Data Migration, Python, ETL Pipeline, Apache Airflow, Tableau, Data Analysis, Data Visualization
Skills: Database Design, Database Architecture, Data Preprocessing, Data Migration, Python, ETL Pipeline, Apache Airflow, Tableau, Data Analysis, Data Visualization
Country: Singapore

item.title: Power BI, Power Apps, and Power Automate Consultant - Upwork
item.description:
Eastgate Software, a leading IT outsourcing company based in Vietnam, is seeking experienced and certified Power BI, Power Apps, and Power Automate consultants for a remote/hybrid consulting position. We specialize in software development and are expanding our services to include business intelligence, application development, and workflow automation solutions. We are looking for some Vietnamese consultants who can deliver high-quality solutions to our clients while working remotely.

Requirements:
- 4-5 years of hands-on experience with Power BI, Power Apps, and Power Automate.
- Relevant certifications in Power BI, Power Apps, and Power Automate.
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
- Excellent English speaking and communication skills (a qualification or language certificate in English is preferred).
- Experience working with clients and understanding their business needs.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a remote team.
Strong organizational and time management skills.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- Proven track record of successfully delivering Power Platform projects.
- Experience in providing training and support to clients.
- Familiarity with the latest trends and best practices in Power Platform technologies.

If you meet the qualifications and are interested in this remote consulting opportunity, please submit your CV, cover letter, and relevant certifications through Upwork, and we will proceed further ASAP. We look forward to receiving your application!

item.title: SQL Developer - Upwork
item.description:
What we know:

Data is currently stored on PowerBI, Azure based system and leveraging complex SQL
SQL is the number 1 skill needed for this role
Must be able to convey ideas and information in addition to perform at strong level
Biggest issue right now is the transformational aspect
They may need to compress 3 rows into 1
This is why they do the heavy lifting in SQL code - PowerBI cannot do this
Examples
Advanced window functions
Aggregate rows
What They Will Be Doing

Extracting client data from one system built using PowerBI and moving to a system that is primarily SSRS but a little fancier
Will be doing run of the mill extracts
Vast majority will be large grids and columns and some dashboards
Heavy lifting will be done in SQL – so must be an expert in SQL
Aggregate functions –data wrangling
Candidate might not be a PowerBI or SSRS Guru - if you have done reporting you can adapt
SSRS features are similar to PowerBI

Responsibilities

Design and implement data models to support reporting and analytics requirements.
Utilize SQL to integrate, transform, and optimize data from various sources for reporting purposes.
Develop visually appealing and insightful reports and dashboards using Microsoft BI tools like Power BI.
Apply in-depth knowledge of Microsoft's BI and data stack, including Power BI, SSRS, and SSIS.
Implement data governance practices to ensure data accuracy, consistency, and security within reports.
Collaborate with business stakeholders, data analysts, and team members to understand reporting requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs.
Adhere to data policies, standards, and best practices for BI development.

Qualifications

Extensive experience writing advanced to extremely complex SQL statements with a deep understanding of SQL code.
Strong understanding of Business Intelligence patterns, data modeling approaches, and OLAP platforms.
Expert-level proficiency with analytics development using common BI tools such as Power BI, SSRS, Tableau, etc.
Comfortable leading analytics efforts independently or as part of a project team.
Excellent communication skills with the ability to present complex ideas effectively and contribute to thought leadership in analytics.
Passion for analytics/BI and the ability to articulate its strategic business value.
Strong aptitude for learning new technologies and analytics techniques.
Highly motivated, accountable, and able to take ownership of projects.
Critical thinking, problem-solving, and analytical skills.
Experience with Validated Systems is strongly preferred.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$70.00

We are seeking expert assistance to establish a data analysis system that will audit and consolidate data from various spreadsheets (Google Sheets, Excel) to accurately aggregate metrics like total billable hours for specific jobs over several months. item.title: Investment Dashboard Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Position Overview: The Analyst will work closely with an individualto help them manage their personal investment portfolio effectively. This role involves creating and maintaining a comprehensive financial dashboard that tracks investments, income, expenses, savings, and other financial activities. The analyst will provide insights and recommendations based on the financial data to help clients achieve their financial goals.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Financial Dashboard Development:
o Design and develop a user-friendly personal finance dashboard.
o Integrate various financial accounts, investment portfolios, and other financial data sources into the dashboard.
o Ensure weekly data synchronization and accuracy.

2. Data Analysis and Reporting:
o Analyze financial data to identify trends, opportunities, and potential risks.
o Prepare detailed financial reports and summaries.
o Provide actionable insights and recommendations based on the analysis.

3. Investment Tracking and Management:
o Monitor investment performance and provide regular updates.
o Conduct research and analysis on potential investment opportunities.
o Assist in portfolio management and rebalancing.

4. Budgeting and Financial Planning:
o Create and maintain personal budgets.
o Develop long-term financial plans based on clients' goals and objectives.
o Provide guidance on savings, debt management, and retirement planning.

5. Client Interaction:
o Maintain regular communication with clients to update them on their financial status and any recommended actions.
o Conduct financial review meetings.
o Respond to inquiries and provide financial advice as needed.

Qualifications:
•  Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, Accounting, or a related field.
•  Proven experience as a financial analyst, investment analyst, or similar role.
•  Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
•  Proficiency in financial software and dashboard tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau, Power BI).
•  Knowledge of investment products, financial markets, and personal finance principles.
•  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Preferred Skills:
•  Advanced certifications such as CPA, CFA or CFP.
•  Experience with personal finance apps and tools.
•  Ability to explain complex financial concepts in a simple manner.
•  Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think critically.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$50.00

Category: Financial Analysis & Modeling
Skills:Forecasting, Mathematics, Financial Modeling, Business Plan, Financial Planning, Financial Report, Microsoft Excel, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Financial Analysis
Skills: Forecasting, Mathematics, Financial Modeling, Business Plan, Financial Planning, Financial Report, Microsoft Excel, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Financial Analysis

item.title: Data Scientist :: with SaaS & PostHog experience - Upwork
item.description:
We are a remote SaaS company with a mission to provide online anonymity to people worldwide.

We’re looking for a professional to help us:

1. Enhance Decision-Making: This includes identifying trends, predicting future outcomes, and providing evidence-based recommendations that improve business performance.

2. Increase Efficiency and Cost Savings: By analyzing and optimizing processes, you can identify areas where resources can be used more effectively, leading to cost reductions and increased operational efficiency.

3. Advance Reporting Capabilities: Implement advanced reporting tools and dashboards that provide real-time insights into key performance indicators (KPIs), operational metrics, and strategic goals.

4. Data Quality and Integrity: Establish and enforce rigorous data governance and quality control measures to ensure the accuracy, completeness, and reliability of the data used for analysis and reporting.

5. Custom Analytics Solutions: Develop custom analytics solutions and models that address specific business questions or challenges.


To be the best fit for this project you need:

- Proficiency in GA4 and substantial experience in Google Analytics with 3+ years of experience.
- Experience in SaaS and PostHog app.
- Efficiency. Able to produce significant output with minimal wasted effort.
- Analytical skills. Able to structure and process qualitative or quantitative data and draw insightful conclusions from it.
- Attention to detail.  No data is irrelevant.
- Proactivity. Acts without being told what to do.
- Flexibility/adaptability. Adjusts quickly to changing priorities and conditions and can adjust the data lake to the needs of the organization.
- Statistical Analysis and Mathematical Skills
- Programming and Data Manipulation: Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or R. Skills in SQL for data retrieval, pandas for data manipulation in Python, or dplyr in R are also important.
- Data Visualization and Reporting: Competence in data visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI, or even Python libraries like Matplotlib and Seaborn is vital.


To apply:

Please begin your application with the word 'PostHog' to demonstrate your attention to detail.

We eagerly await your application!


Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00

Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Marketing Analytics, Operations Analytics, Product Analytics, Google Analytics, Data Science
Skills: Marketing Analytics, Operations Analytics, Product Analytics, Google Analytics, Data Science
Country: Seychelles
